resetDialog.title: Are you sure?

importData.title: Import data
importData.description: Copy data from an external @:appName data folder and import it into the current @:appName data folder

encryption.tooltip: Manage how your data is stored and encrypted
encryption.descriptionNoEncryption: Turning on encryption will encrypt all data. This can not be undone.

dialog.title: Encrypt all your data?
dialog.description: Encrypting all your data will keep your data safe and secure. This action can NOT be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

cache.title: Clear cache
cache.description: If you encounter issues with images not loading or fonts not displaying correctly, try clearing your cache. This action will not remove your user data.

dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.description: Clearing the cache will cause images and fonts to be re-downloaded on load. This action will not remove or modify your data.

keybindings.outdentLineCodeblock: Delete two spaces at line start

keybindings.moveCursorRightSelect: Select and move cursor right one
keybindings.moveCursorEndSelect: Select and move cursor to the end

keybindings.moveCursorBottomSelect: Select and move cursor to the bottom
keybindings.leftInTableCell: Move left one cell in table
keybindings.rightInTableCell: Move right one cell in table
keybindings.upInTableCell: Move up one cell in table
keybindings.downInTableCell: Move down one cell in table
keybindings.tabInTableCell: Go to next available cell in table
keybindings.shiftTabInTableCell: Go to previously available cell in table
keybindings.backSpaceInTableCell: Stop at the beginning of the cell

aiCredit.title: Add AppFlowy AI Credit

currentPlan.freeInfo: Perfect for individuals or small teams up to 3 members.
currentPlan.proInfo: Perfect for small and medium teams up to 10 members.
currentPlan.teamInfo: Perfect for all productive and well-organized teams..
currentPlan.canceledInfo: Your plan is cancelled, you will be downgraded to the Free plan on {}.

deal.title: Grow your team!
deal.info: Upgrade and save 10% off Pro and Team plans! Boost your workspace productivity with powerful new features including Appflowy Ai.

actions.downgradeDisabledTooltip: You will automatically downgrade at the end of the billing cycle

freePlan.title: Free
freePlan.description: For organizing every corner of your work & life.

proPlan.title: Professional
proPlan.description: A place for small groups to plan & get organized.

paymentSuccess.title: You are now on the {} plan!
paymentSuccess.description: Your payment has been successfully processed and your plan is upgraded to AppFlowy {}. You can view your plan details on the Plan page

downgradeDialog.title: Are you sure you want to downgrade your plan?
downgradeDialog.description: Downgrading your plan will revert you back to the Free plan. Members may lose access to workspaces and you may need to free up space to meet the storage limits of the Free plan.
